script.code:
echo BEGIN "$variables_PA_TASK_NAME"
INSTANCE_NAME=$variables_INSTANCE_NAME
if [ "$(docker ps -a | grep $INSTANCE_NAME)" ]; then RUNNING=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Running }}" $INSTANCE_NAME 2> /dev/null) STOPPED=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Status }}" $INSTANCE_NAME 2> /dev/null) if [ "$RUNNING" == "true" ]; then echo "$INSTANCE_NAME container is running" elif [ "$STOPPED" == "exited" ]; then echo "Starting $INSTANCE_NAME container" docker start $INSTANCE_NAME fi fi echo END "$variables_PA_TASK_NAME"
